name: Stufato di carne Sabz sospetto
desc: A meat stew with a unique taste. The sourness feels a little too much. The scent itself inspires not-so-appetizing associations... Leave it be for a while longer, and it might just become the perfect breeding ground for Fungi.

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Ricetta: stufato di carne Sabz
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sabz Meat Stew.

customize.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bocca di leone
customize.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

customize.name: Cipolla
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Spezie
customize.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

customize.name: Stufato di carne Sabz
customize.desc: A meat stew with a unique taste. A variety of vegetables are mixed together, then chopped into small pieces and stewed with meat. The addition of lemons gives the final product a mildly sour taste. The people of Sumeru usually enjoy this dish over rice.

customize.name: Stufato di carne Sabz delizioso
customize.desc: A meat stew with a unique taste. The fragrant ingredients complement each other perfectly. Large pieces of fresh meat are stewed until tender and coated in dark green, as if inviting all who taste it for a leisurely stroll in the forest.
